errors.error_description: The logical order of operations is incorrect. Dependencies are being installed into the global Python environment before the local virtual environment is created and activated.
correction_candidates: Remove the virtual environment steps as they are optional.
Run `pip install --user -r requirements/core.txt` to avoid global installation issues.
Move step 1 (Install dependencies) to be after step 2 (Create and activate a virtual environment).
Combine the steps into one: `python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements/core.txt`
errors.golden_answer: Move step 1 (Install dependencies) to be after step 2 (Create and activate a virtual environment).
